alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 15 at 4:41AM MST until February 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, winds have eased significantly and are no longer expected to pose a problem. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 13 expected. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
